title: The Real Oprah Effect: There's Now An Epic Short Squeeze In Weight Watcher's Stock
text:
Published By: Forbes.com: Business - Today 
For more than three years, the stock of Weight Watcher's (NYSE:WTW) has been heading south, losing close to 75%....
